Design System Kitchen Sink

Complete showcase of all design system patterns and components

Typography

Display Typography (Headings)

Heading 6XL

font-size: var(--text-6xl);

Heading 5XL

font-size: var(--text-5xl);

Heading 4XL

font-size: var(--text-4xl);

Heading 3XL

font-size: var(--text-3xl);

Heading 2XL

font-size: var(--text-2xl);

Content Typography (Lean Scale)

Large content text (1.125em) - Use for emphasized content

class="text-content-lg" or font-size: var(--text-content-lg);

Base content text (1em) - Default body text

class="text-content-base" or font-size: var(--text-content-base);

Small content text (0.875em) - Use for captions and secondary text

class="text-content-sm" or font-size: var(--text-content-sm);

Content Example

Article Title

This is the default body text using the lean content typography scale. It provides excellent readability while maintaining a clean, minimal aesthetic. The line height is set to 1.6 for optimal reading experience.

Small text for captions, metadata, or less important information.

Color System

All background colors include preset foreground colors to ensure proper contrast and visibility.

Navy Background

class="bg-navy"

Navy Light Background

class="bg-navy-light"

Sunset Background

class="bg-sunset"

Forest Background

class="bg-forest"

Fire Background

class="bg-fire"

Night Background

class="bg-night"

Sky Background

class="bg-sky"

Warm Background

class="bg-warm"

Cool Background

class="bg-cool"

White Background

class="bg-white"

Block Background

class="bg-block"

Card Components

Basic Card

Eyebrow

Card Title

This is a basic card with no hover effects. Perfect for static content displays.

<div class="card"> <span class="card-eyebrow">Eyebrow</span> <h3 class="card-title">Card Title</h3> <p class="card-description">Content</p> </div>

Elevated Card

Hover Me

Elevated Card

This card lifts on hover with enhanced shadow. Great for interactive content.

Learn More →
<div class="card card-elevated"> <span class="card-eyebrow">Eyebrow</span> <h3 class="card-title">Card Title</h3> <p class="card-description">Content</p> <a href="#" class="card-link">Link</a> </div>

Cards with Background Colors

Navy Card

Dark Background

Text automatically uses white foreground for proper contrast.

Sunset Card

Light Background

Text automatically uses navy foreground for readability.

Forest Card

Natural Theme

All colors ensure proper contrast ratios.

<div class="card card-elevated bg-navy">...</div> <div class="card card-elevated bg-sunset">...</div> <div class="card card-elevated bg-forest">...</div>

Image Card

Image Background

Overlay Card

This card uses an image background with a gradient overlay for text readability.

<div class="card card-image" style="background-image: url('...');"> <div class="card-content"> <span class="card-eyebrow">Eyebrow</span> <h3 class="card-title">Title</h3> <p class="card-description">Content</p> </div> </div>

Split Card

Split Layout

Split Card

This card splits content and image side by side. On mobile, it stacks vertically.

<div class="card card-split"> <div class="card-image-section"> <img src="..." alt="..." /> </div> <div class="card-content-section"> <span class="card-eyebrow">Eyebrow</span> <h3 class="card-title">Title</h3> <p class="card-description">Content</p> </div> </div>

Web Components

Design Card Component

<design-card variant="elevated" background="navy" eyebrow="Web Component" title="Design Card" description="Content here" link-text="Learn More" link-href="#"> </design-card>

Design Button Component

Small Button Base Button Large Button Secondary
<design-button variant="primary" size="base">Button Text</design-button> <design-button variant="secondary" size="sm">Secondary</design-button>

Spacing System

All spacing uses em multipliers based on the 8pt grid system.

--space-xs (0.25em)
Extra Small Spacing
--space-sm (0.5em)
Small Spacing
--space-md (1em)
Medium Spacing
--space-lg (1.5em)
Large Spacing
--space-xl (2em)
Extra Large Spacing
--space-2xl (3em)
2X Large Spacing

Border Radius

Small Radius (12px)

border-radius: var(--radius-sm);

Medium Radius (20px)

border-radius: var(--radius-md);

Large Radius (28px)

border-radius: var(--radius-lg);

Extra Large Radius (36px)

border-radius: var(--radius-xl);

Shadows

Small Shadow

box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);

Medium Shadow

box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);

Large Shadow

box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);

Extra Large Shadow

box-shadow: var(--shadow-xl);
